channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Swollen rivers are flooding towns in the US South after a prolonged deluge of rain
item.description: Rivers rose and flooding worsened across the U.S. South and Midwest, threatening communities already waterlogged and badly damaged by days of heavy rain and storms that killed at least 20 people.

item.title: RFK Jr. visits epicenter of Texas measles outbreak after death of second child who was infected
US bishops halt partnerships with federal government on aid programs, citing funding cuts
